original: intros l x. induction l as [| y l' IHl]. - left. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (IHl x) as [Hl | [y' [HIn Hmax]]]. + right. exists y. split. apply in_eq. auto. + destruct (le_dec y y'). * right. exists y'. split. apply in_cons. auto. apply Hmax. * right. exists y. split. apply in_eq. apply fold_left_maximum_le'. auto.
